Class object.Bomb

java.lang.Object
object.Bomb
Direct Known Subclasses:
main.NormalBomb
public abstract class object.Bomb extends Object
The object.Bomb class represents an explosive object that can be placed on the game board. A bomb has a countdown timer that decrements each turn, after which it will explode.

This class is abstract because different bomb types (such as a normal bomb or a walking bomb that will soon be implemented for MCO2) may behave differently before detonation. For example, a normal bomb remains stationary, whereas a walking bomb may move across the board while its timer is decreasing and can also be detonated prematurely.

    protected int
    rowIndex
    The row index of the bomb on the board.
    protected int
    turnsTilExplosion
    Number of turns remaining before the bomb explodes.

  • Constructor Details

    • object.Bomb

      public object.Bomb(int rowIndex, int colIndex, int turnsTilExplosion)
      Constructs a new object.Bomb with a given board position and countdown time.
      Parameters:
      rowIndex - the row where the bomb is placed
      colIndex - the column where the bomb is placed
      turnsTilExplosion - the number of turns before detonation

  • Method Details

    • decrementCountdown

      public void decrementCountdown()
      Decreases the bomb's countdown timer by 1 turn if it is still above zero. This should typically be called once per game turn/tick.

    • getRowIndex

      public int getRowIndex()
      Returns the row index where this bomb is placed.
      Returns:
      the row index

    • getColIndex

      public int getColIndex()
      Returns the column index where this bomb is placed.
      Returns:
      the column index

    • setRowIndex

      public void setRowIndex(int rowIndex)
      Updates the row index of this bomb (e.g., if it is moved).
      Parameters:
      rowIndex - the new row position

    • setColIndex

      public void setColIndex(int colIndex)
      Updates the column index of this bomb (e.g., if it is moved).
      Parameters:
      colIndex - the new column position

    • getTurnsTillExplosion

      public int getTurnsTillExplosion()
      Returns the number of turns remaining before the bomb explodes.
      Returns:
      the turns left until explosion

    • getType

      public abstract char getType()
      Returns the character representing this bomb on the board. This is abstract because different bomb types may have different visual symbols.
      Returns:
      the character type of the bomb

    • getIsActive

      public boolean getIsActive()
      Returns the state of the bomb.
      Returns:
      true if the bomb is active, false otherwise

    • activate

      public void activate()
      Activates the bomb and resets its countdown timer to its original value.

    • deactivate

      public void deactivate()
      Deactivates the bomb
